Uses of Class
org.smslib.modem.athandler.ATHandler

Packages that use ATHandler
org.smslib.modem.athandler Classes for the handling of 3GPP AT commands. 
 

Uses of ATHandler in org.smslib.modem.athandler
 

Subclasses of ATHandler in org.smslib.modem.athandler
 class ATHandler_Huawei
          AT Handler for Huawei modems.
 class ATHandler_Huawei_E160
          AT Handler for Huawei E160 modems.
 class ATHandler_Huawei_E226
          AT Handler for Huawei E226 modems.
 class ATHandler_MultiTech
          AT Handler for Multitech modems.
 class ATHandler_Siemens_HC25
          A custom AT handler for the Siemens/Cinterion HC25 circumventing the problem of the modem losing its SMSC address after issuing 'ATZ' or 'AT&F' by reloading the address from the SIM card.
 class ATHandler_Siemens_MC35i
           
 class ATHandler_Siemens_MC35i_FD
           
 class ATHandler_SonyEricsson
           
 class ATHandler_SonyEricsson_GC89
           
 class ATHandler_Telit
           
 class ATHandler_Teltonika
           
 class ATHandler_Ubinetics_GDC201
          This handler supports Ubinecits GDC201 GSM PCMCIA cards.
 class ATHandler_Wavecom
          AT Handler for Wavecom modems.
 class ATHandler_Wavecom_FXT009
          AT Handler for Wavecom modems.
 class ATHandler_Wavecom_Q2438F
          AT Handler for Wavecom Q2438F CDMA modems.
 class ATHandler_Wavecom_SunTraveller
          AT Handler for Wavecom SunTraveller CDMA modems.
 class ATHandler_Wavecom_WISMOQCDMA
          AT Handler for Wavecom WISMOQ CDMA modems.
 class ATHandler_ZTE_MF622
          AT Handler for ZTE MF622 (Thanks to Dustin Cheng!).
